-- | websockets support for apiary web framework.
--   
@package apiary-websockets
@version 1.4.0

module Web.Apiary.WebSockets

-- | websocket only action. since 0.8.0.0.
webSockets :: (Monad m, Monad n) => (Dict prms -> ServerApp) -> ApiaryT exts prms n m ()

-- | websocket only action. since 0.8.0.0.
webSockets' :: (Monad m, Monad actM) => ConnectionOptions -> (Dict prms -> ServerApp) -> ApiaryT exts prms actM m ()
actionWithWebSockets :: (Monad m, Monad actM) => (Dict prms -> ServerApp) -> ActionT exts prms actM () -> ApiaryT exts prms actM m ()
actionWithWebSockets' :: (Monad m, Monad actM) => ConnectionOptions -> (Dict prms -> ServerApp) -> ActionT exts prms actM () -> ApiaryT exts prms actM m ()
websocketsToAction :: Monad m => ConnectionOptions -> (Dict prms -> ServerApp) -> ActionT exts prms m ()
